hero.title: Protect your data with simple powerfull access security
hero.description: We're WeeVPN. Our modern access security is designed to safeguard all users, devices and applications — so you can stay focused on what you do best.

logoCarousel.title: These brands, each innovating in their own field, come together to form the sustainable and comprehensive structure of the <weecoins>WeeCoins Premium</weecoins> ecosystem.

Cards.title: WeeVPN's Key Features
Cards.description: Scalable options to choose for Network & Infrastructure Security. Security Operations & Incident Response, Cloud Security and lot Security.

card1.title: Military-Grade Encryption
card1.description: WeeVPN uses industry-standard encryption to protect your internet traffic from hackers, surveillance, and data leaks — anytime, anywhere.

card2.title: Global Server Coverage
card2.description: Connect to high-speed VPN servers in multiple countries to bypass content restrictions and enjoy full internet freedom without compromise.

card3.title: Optimized Performance
card3.description: Enjoy low-latency, high-speed connections with smart routing that keeps your browsing, streaming, and gaming smooth and uninterrupted.

card4.title: Privacy-First Design
card4.description: No logs, no tracking, no compromise. WeeVPN is built with a strict privacy-first philosophy to keep your identity truly protected online.

card1.title: Designed for teams of all sizes. Engineered to protect your mission.
card1.description: WeeVPN's access security shields any and every application from compromised credentials and devices and its comprehensive coverage helps you meet compliance requirements with ease.

card2.title: Intuitive authentication for users. Powerful flexibility for companies.
card2.description: WeeVPN's natively integrates with applications to provide flexible, user-friendly security that's quick to roll out and easy to manage. It’s a win, win, win for users, administrators, and IT teams alike.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Here is a list of the most frequently asked questions about WeeVPN. If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us.

question1.title: What is WeeVPN?
question1.answer: WeeVPN is a virtual private network (VPN) service that encrypts your internet connection to protect your online privacy and provide secure access to censored content.

question2.title: Does using a VPN slow down my internet?
question2.answer: Using a VPN can slightly affect your internet speed due to encryption. However, WeeVPN minimizes this with high-speed servers.

question3.title: Which devices can I use WeeVPN on?
question3.answer: WeeVPN is being developed to support all major operating systems including Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS.

question4.title: Is WeeVPN free?
question4.answer: WeeVPN aims to offer a free plan with basic features. Advanced features will be available in premium packages.

question5.title: Do you keep logs?
question5.answer: Your privacy is our priority. WeeVPN follows a strict no-log policy, meaning it does not record user activity.

question6.title: Is using a VPN legal?
question6.answer: Using a VPN is completely legal in most countries. However, users are responsible for complying with local laws.

question7.title: Can I access platforms like Netflix with WeeVPN?
question7.answer: WeeVPN is designed to bypass geo-restrictions. Access to streaming services may vary over time.

question8.title: Can I get support if I have a problem?
question8.answer: Yes. The WeeVPN team is available to assist you with any technical issues you may experience.

footer.title: Experience secure, lightning-fast browsing — Try WeeVPN for FREE today!
footer.footerDesc: WeeVPN is a modern access security platform designed to protect all users, devices, and applications — so you can focus on doing your best work.
footer.followUsDesc: Follow us on our social media channels to get the latest news and updates.

article1.title: Introduction
article1.description: This privacy policy applies to all visitors and users of the WeeVPN service. We value the privacy of our users and attach great importance to the protection of personal data.

article2.title: Collected Information
article2.description: Certain personal data is collected in order to provide the service. These include:
article2.item5: Connection logs (for security purposes only, no traffic data is stored)
article2.item6: IP address and device information (for security and analytics purposes)

article3.title: Use of Information
article3.description: Collected information may be used for the following purposes:

article4.title: Information Sharing
article4.description: User information is not shared with third parties except where legally required. Necessary data may be shared with sub-service providers (e.g., hosting, email delivery) solely for service provision.

article5.title: Cookies
article5.description: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You may choose to reject cookies via your browser settings; however, this may limit certain functions.

article6.title: Data Retention Period
article6.description: Personal data is retained for as long as you use the service and for a reasonable period in accordance with legal obligations. Upon request, your personal data can be deleted.

article7.title: Security
article7.description: All necessary technical and administrative measures are taken to ensure the security of your personal data. Methods such as SSL, firewalls, and access controls are used to protect data.

article8.title: Your Rights
article8.description: Under the Personal Data Protection Law, you have the following rights:

article9.title: Contact
article9.description: For any questions regarding our privacy policy, please contact us at info@weevpn.com.

distanceSalesAgreement.title: Distance Sales Agreement
distanceSalesAgreement.description: This Distance Sales Agreement is established electronically between the parties listed below under the terms and conditions specified herein.

article1.title: Parties
article1.item2: Address: Yukarı Öveçler Mah. Lizbon Cad.

distanceSalesAgreement.subtitle: Buyer (Customer):
distanceSalesAgreement.subdescription: The user who registers on the WeeVPN website and purchases the VPN service.

article2.title: Subject
article2.description: This agreement regulates the rights and obligations of the parties in accordance with the Consumer Protection Law No. 6502 and relevant Distance Contracts Regulation, regarding the sale and delivery of the VPN service ordered by the Buyer electronically via www.weevpn.com.

article3.title: Product/Service Information
article3.item2: Price: The amount specified in the system at the time of order
article3.item3: Delivery Method: Account information delivered via email or user panel

article4.title: Payment
article4.description: Before completing the purchase, the Buyer confirms the total price and the selected payment method. Payment is made via credit card, debit card, or online payment systems.

article5.title: Delivery
article5.description: The VPN service is provided electronically to the user after payment. No physical delivery is made. The Buyer declares acceptance of this condition.

article6.title: Right of Withdrawal
article6.description: The Buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal before the service is delivered. However, once the service is made available (such as sharing account credentials or activating the VPN), the right of withdrawal becomes void.

article7.title: Responsibilities
article7.item1: The Seller is obligated to deliver the service on time and without any defects.
article7.item2: The Buyer declares that the information provided during the order is accurate.
article7.item3: The Seller is not responsible for access issues caused by the Buyer's fault.

article8.title: Dispute Resolution
article8.description: In case of any disputes arising from this agreement, Consumer Arbitration Boards and Consumer Courts shall have jurisdiction.

article9.title: Enforcement
article9.description: By placing an order on www.weevpn.com, the Buyer is deemed to have accepted all terms of this agreement. This agreement enters into force on the date it is digitally approved.

article1.title: Delivery Conditions
article1.description: WeeVPN service is activated instantly after the completion of your payment. Your account information and connection instructions are provided via email, user panel, or a private link.

article2.title: Delivery Method
article2.description: Our service is entirely digital; no physical shipment is made. VPN service is provided via software applications and a web panel, and can be accessed on various devices.

article3.title: Return Conditions
article3.description: Due to the nature of digital products, returns are not generally possible. However, special solutions may be offered in the following cases:
article3.item1: Failure to activate the service within the promised time frame
article3.item2: Significant discrepancies between the delivered VPN service and the advertised features or performance
article3.item3: Technical issues that prevent access to the VPN service

article4.title: Return Process
article4.description: In such cases, users can contact info@weevpn.com within 7 days via email. After evaluating the request, re-delivery, correction, or exceptional refunds may be issued as needed.

article5.title: Contact
article5.description: For any questions or support requests, feel free to contact us at info@weevpn.com.
